channel.title: Eclipse-Rsps v.4 Re-Opened ~PvP/Skill/Eco
channel.description: [center][size=24pt]Eclipse-Rsps[/size][/center] [size=8pt]As some of you may know, my last few releases have been apart of the Eclipse-Rsps PvP series. This version however will not be released to the public. I am going to put this online just to see how far it can go ( goal is to have 30 online at one time ). Yes this sounds like a simple goal but i will not be paying for hosting/advertisement. [/size] [size=24pt]The Reason Why[/size] [size=8pt]I am putting this server online because i see to many server's these days that are "pk servers". Back in maybe 2009 or 2008 the deffinition of a pking server was that you PK for your items and that Player Killing was a big part of the server, but that doesnt mean spawn every item and the only thing you can do is PK. I have made the server based on Pking and Skilling for ECP Points. Everytime you level up in a skilling skill ( minning, cooking, fishing, woodcutting, ect. ) you gain 1 ECP. The rates on these skills are 2 though, so it should take fairly long to get a 99 skill. ( roughly 3 hours ). [/size] [size=24pt]The Team Needed[/size] 1.Website Developer 0/1 2.Hoster 0/1 3.Server Sided Developer 0/1 4.Client Sided Developer 0/1 [size=8pt]I will be needing [img]http://i1055.photobucket.com/albums/s519/eclipse-rsps/1-1.png[/img] [img]http://i1055.photobucket.com/albums/s519/eclipse-rsps/7-1.png[/img] [img]http://i1055.photobucket.com/albums/s519/eclipse-rsps/6-1.png[/img] [img]http://i1055.photobucket.com/albums/s519/eclipse-rsps/5-1.png[/img] [img]http://i1055.photobucket.com/albums/s519/eclipse-rsps/4-1.png[/img] [img]http://i1055.photobucket.com/albums/s519/eclipse-rsps/2-1.png[/img] [img]http://i1055.photobucket.com/albums/s519/eclipse-rsps/3-1.png[/img] ~Application~ [code]How Old Are You?: What are you applying for?: What time zone are you in?: How long can you be on each day?: Are you familiar with PI?: Show me some of your work:[/code][/size]

item.title: Eclipse-Rsps v.4 Re-Opened ~PvP/Skill/Eco
item.dc:creator: @RelicFX RelicFX
item.description:
@RelicFX wrote:

[quote=“eclipse rsps, post:12, topic:451591”][quote author=RelicFX link=topic=554473.msg4061631#msg4061631 date=1343484786]

How Old Are You?: 13
What are you applying for?: Server side coding
What time zone are you in?: +1
How long can you be on each day?: 5-9hrs
Are you familiar with PI?: Yes
Show me some of your work: You saw my work ik DingDongDing , xassasinscapex , and now RelicFX xat chatbox name TikTak you saw my work

Skype : Amir.Motaffaf

no, ive never seen your work plese post some, and for everyone else, i need to see a link to a server/download/video of your work before i except you.

All my work is on page 1 on server downlaods

EnginePvp First Release
AssasinScape second Release
RelicFX would be my third

EDIT; Btw you can always test me
i code with teamviewer exept if its kinda hard than i want source

I use dropbox. and give me a [size=18pt]LINK[/size] to your work, im not going to rummage through server downloads to find it.

First Release

item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

Well well, look who’s back. Good luck with this, all I’m going to say is: If you’re going to spawn N.P.C. right next to each other, at least make them face directions other than South. It’s a very easy addition.

Good luck!

@eclipse_rsps wrote:

[center][size=24pt]Eclipse-Rsps[/size][/center]
[size=8pt]As some of you may know, my last few releases have been apart of the Eclipse-Rsps PvP series. This version however will not be released to the public. I am going to put this online just to see how far it can go ( goal is to have 30 online at one time ). Yes this sounds like a simple goal but i will not be paying for hosting/advertisement. [/size]
[size=24pt]The Reason Why[/size]
[size=8pt]I am putting this server online because i see to many server’s these days that are “pk servers”. Back in maybe 2009 or 2008 the deffinition of a pking server was that you PK for your items and that Player Killing was a big part of the server, but that doesnt mean spawn every item and the only thing you can do is PK. I have made the server based on Pking and Skilling for ECP Points. Everytime you level up in a skilling skill ( minning, cooking, fishing, woodcutting, ect. ) you gain 1 ECP. The rates on these skills are 2 though, so it should take fairly long to get a 99 skill. ( roughly 3 hours ). [/size]
[size=24pt]The Team Needed[/size]
1.Website Developer 0/1
2.Hoster 0/1
3.Server Sided Developer 0/1
4.Client Sided Developer 0/1
